meanings.sent1: The children chatter excitedly about their favorite toys.
meanings.sent2: During lunch break, friends chatter about their weekend plans.
meanings.sent3: The birds outside seem to chatter non-stop, like they have a lot to share.
meanings.sent4: Her teeth chatter from the cold wind, creating a rhythmic sound.
meanings.sent5: The old radio chattered on, filling the room with noise.

meanings.sent1: The constant chatter in the classroom made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent2: The chatter of the crowd at the game added to the excitement.
meanings.sent3: The chatter of the squirrels in the park sounded like a lively debate.
meanings.sent4: Amidst the chatter of the party, she heard her name being called.
meanings.sent5: The chatter of the stream was a soothing background noise.
